programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) (Repeat) Ep71
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep20
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep2829
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep413
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Hello Again! (M) Ep2324
programme.desc: Just 100 days left until the college entrance examination. Chang Ke-Ai, a top student, and Yang Zih-Hao, a renowned prankster, the twelve-graders make a wager in school one day after a squabble. In a twist of fate, the wager turns out to alter the courses of their lives.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu’s life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Needing You
programme.desc: Office politics and love between co-workers complicates the lives of two computer-company employees in this romantic comedy starring Andy Lau and Sammi Cheng.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: Set in the Second Sino-Japanese War, a railroad worker, Ma Yuan, leads a team of guerilla fighters and forms the “Railroad Tigers” to steal supplies from the Japanese army for the poor. Unarmed and outnumbered, they must rely on their wits to fight against an entire army.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit…

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: During the early years of the Republic era, in the North-East region of China, the people are suffering from the power struggle among the local Warlords, bandits, and Japanese invaders. Warlord Lam (Sammo Hung), is not a leader of great vision, but stands firm in his own beliefs. The only paradise within the region is 'Lucky Town', the one place where no one dared to attack as it was protected by the seven kung fu masters who have resided there. When young patriots, Yan Fang (Rose Chan) who disguised herself as a man, and Howard Luo (Dennis To), infiltrate Tiger's Den at night trying to steal the code book fail in their mission and tries to run, only Yan survives and is rescued by Cheryl. Mistaking Yan as a man, Cheryl falls for Yan. She then brings Yan to Lucky Town and begs the Seven Masters to cure Yan. Cheryl and the Seven Masters are then told of the secret plan by the Japanese, and together, they resolve to fight against Tiger Den and save Warlord Lam.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to “Casino Tycoon”. 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down…

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene!

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following “The Way We Are”, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a town nearby are at stake. A retired soldier and his son, step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Jack, a renowned archaeology professor, and his team are on a quest to locate a lost ancient Indian treasure. They find a diamond key unlocking the treasure, but it is snatched by a team of mercenaries. Jack leads his team to India and Dubai to beat the mercenaries to the treasure.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Bao’s chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: Pursuit Of A Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies’ youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Martial Club
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung and his friend Wang Yin Lin find themselves and their martial arts schools pitted against another rival school and the expert they hire, Master Shan. This is a masterpiece of Director Liu Chia Liang and one of the top ten movies in 1981.

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung is the son of an entrepreneur of a big corporation. Lian Lian is the niece of a Kindergarten’s principal. Fate has brought them together as Da Yung loses his wallet by mistake when they first met. Further misunderstanding occurs when Da Yung tries to use Lian Lian as an excuse to drive the two women he does not love away.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: A heroic family is double crossed and massacred on the battle field with only two of the brothers surviving the slaughter. One of the brothers (Gordon Liu), escapes to a Shaolin temple where his bloodlust and thirst for vengeance puts him at odds with the monks. When he discovers his sister is captured by the same villains who destroyed his family he leaves the monastery in an attempt to rescue her and avenge what has come upon his family.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon’s clutches.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: Chief of Wu Tang, Ching Chung (Wang Jung) is beaten and wounded by Head of Wu Ti, Tu Ku (Alex Man Chi-leung) in a 10-yearly duel between these remaining two thriving clans. Tu Ku offers to duel with Ching Chung again in two years, hoping to counter his rival clan's Silkworm Skill. Ching Chung's pupilFu Yu-shu (Liu Yung), finds Yun (Hsu Shao-chiang) to be Ching-chung's illegitimate child, and kills Ching-chung, to frame Yun. He then proclaims himself the new Wu Tang Chief and orders the killing of Yun. Meanwhile, Yun learns Silkworm Skill and finally become a No.1 martial artist, she purges the Wu Tang clan and kills Fu to avenge her father's death.

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actor, Danny Lee, who is both director and main actor in this film. Danny Li is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured during an illegal race. Mai Tak Lo is the student of Li. With Li’s help, Mai wins a race in Macau. However, because of money and honour, Mai starts to join illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out…

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth...

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of the tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer money while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army’s help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: After killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk, Wu Song is appointed as chief constable. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang seduces Wu Song but gets rejected and later engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang after he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother’s death, Wu Song kills the two of them.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master’s rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao’s betrayal…

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor'S Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao (Chen Chia-chi) is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun (Wang Jung), the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi (Chao Kuo) - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang (Liu Yung) to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern – an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all…

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Come Drink With Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow” is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar “Drunken Cat” who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kong’s entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: Martial Arts Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers’ death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire’s Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by Jin Yong, havoc breaks out when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, training manual, treasure map & a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: Return Of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ruthless ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dong clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun Fei Yang masters the silkworm martial arts style and takes revenge on Wu Di. Unfortunately, Yun is defeated and seriously hurt, so Master Li Bu Yi brings him to treatment while the ninjas pursue Yun relentlessly.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: The subtle repackage of the most filmed Ching Dynasty novel, The Dream Of The Red Chamber by renowned director Li Han-hsiang has earned public acclaim by attaining The Best Art Direction of The 15th Golden Horse Award, The Best Costume and The Best Art Direction Of The 24th Asian Film Festival. Brigitte Lin and Sylvia Chang play the adorable yet sorrowful couple Bao Yu and Dai Yu; playing their roles to the hilt in this gloomy love story of their uncontrollable destinies.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries the young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this “young” auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Ode To Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: V
programme.desc: A mystery man named V sets out to exact revenge for his wife's brutal murder. However, he must evade a police officer, who is determined to catch him.

programme.title: Zombie Reddy
programme.desc: Mario, a game developer, and his friends, get caught up in the rivalry between two families and a mysterious zombie attack in Rayalaseema where they go to attend a friend's wedding.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Kennedy Club
programme.desc: Savarimuthu, an ex-soldier, falls sick while training the women's kabaddi team of his village. Soon, a former student named Muruganandham is chosen to take his place.

programme.title: Varappogum 24 Manikkul
programme.desc: Three fugitives barge into a couple's house while escaping the authorities. However, they are flummoxed after finding the wife concealing a murder that has transpired in her home.

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Priya and Ranjan have paranormal experiences after she buys an antique box from a dealer. They learn that the box is a dybbuk and take the help of a rabbi to learn its history.

programme.title: 8 Thotakkal
programme.desc: Sathya, an honest policeman, accidentally loses his service pistol while tailing a criminal. However, the thief who stole the pistol sells it to Murthy and he goes on a killing spree.

programme.title: Irumbuthirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.

programme.title: Vyjayanthi Ips
programme.desc: Vyjayanthi is a police officer who is dedicated to her work. When she arrests a young man who was involved in a sexual assault case, his father vows to kill her.

programme.title: Enakku Innoru Per Irukku
programme.desc: Johnny, a simple man, is in love with Hema, whose father, Dass, is a gangster looking for his successor. But in order to marry Hema, he must become a gangster and help Dass eliminate his enemies.

programme.title: Veterivel
programme.desc: In a bid to help his younger brother unite with the girl he loves, Vetrivel and his friends decide to kidnap her. Things take an ugly turn when their plan goes wrong and results in messy situations.

programme.title: Enna Solla Pogiraai
programme.desc: Vikram, a young man, plans to make his fiancee fall in love with him. However, when his plan backfires, he finds himself embroiled in a love triangle.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Rowdy Boys
programme.desc: Kavya, a medical student, and Akshay, an engineering student, begin to fall for each other. However, an ugly gang war between their respective colleges impacts their love story.

programme.title: Chennai Palani Mars
programme.desc: An aspiring scientist and a musician, who are cocaine-addicts, attempt to travel to Mars with the help of a scientifically unstable concept.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Endrendrum Punnagai
programme.desc: Goutham grows up hating women after his mother abandons him during his childhood. Though he decides to stay single while his friends marry, Priya changes his mind about singlehood.

programme.title: Seeru
programme.desc: A guy from a small-town takes on a ruthless criminal lawyer for his friend and sister

programme.title: Kadaisi Nodigal (Forensic)
programme.desc: When a psychotic murderer sets out on a killing spree, a medico-legal advisor uses his forensic skills to unravel the truth behind the heinous deeds.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Mersal
programme.desc: Maaran, a doctor, is falsely arrested for the murder of his colleague, Dr Arjun Zachariah. He soon discovers that the real culprit is a lookalike who aims to expose corruption in the medical industry.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep47
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Upon being released from prison, Sachi demands to lead a tranquil life with his family. However, fate has other plans for the ex-convict when he encounters a dangerous drug lord.

programme.title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster Returns
programme.desc: Aditya is trying to recover from his wife's betrayal and his physical disability. Meanwhile, Indrajeet Singh, a prince whose property was confiscated by Aditya's family, returns to exact revenge.

programme.title: Pyar Ki Ladai
programme.desc: A jobless man spends his time doing unfruitful things, but his life changes when he falls in love with the sister of a sarpanch. However, to marry her, he must win a kabaddi match.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Direct Ishq
programme.desc: Vicky, a rough local of Varanasi, covets Dolly who wishes to become a professional singer. Complications ensue when Kabeer, a rich event organiser, takes a fancy to her while helping her succeed.

programme.title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
programme.desc: Sooraj Dhanrajgir, a playboy, falls in love with Komal, who rejects him because of his vices and gives him time to change. Things go awry when a little boy shows up claiming to be his son.

programme.title: Luv U Soniyo
programme.desc: Mark, a collegian, falls head over heels for Soniyo, who develops feelings for him as well. However, their parents oppose their union as they both hail from different cultural backgrounds.

programme.title: Ki & Ka
programme.desc: Kia, an ambitious woman, marries Kabir, a man who prefers the role of a house husband. They enjoy their unconventional relationship until challenges including ego clashes and jealousy set in.

programme.title: Ki & Ka
programme.desc: Kia, an ambitious woman, marries Kabir, a man who prefers the role of a house husband. They enjoy their unconventional relationship until challenges including ego clashes and jealousy set in.

programme.title: Action Replayy
programme.desc: A son tries to revive his parents' lifeless marriage by travelling back in time to the '70s when their romance was budding. But to his surprise, it turns out to be more complex than he had expected.

programme.title: Thackeray
programme.desc: Balasaheb Thackeray, a cartoonist with a no-nonsense personality, plays a key role in the birth of the Shiv Sena and goes on to become the most influential political leader in Maharashtra.

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Two penniless friends are in desperate need of money in order to marry their respective girlfriends. In their attempts to make quick money, they kidnap a rich woman's pet and demand a hefty ransom.

programme.title: The Legend Of Bhagat Singh
programme.desc: Born in British India, Bhagat Singh witnesses numerous atrocities during his childhood and grows up to become one of the most fearless freedom fighters in the country.

programme.title: Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai
programme.desc: Rahul falls in love with Sandhya, a fellow college student, but realises that she does not reciprocate his feelings. Undeterred by her rejection, he still pursues her but pays a huge price for it.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars

programme.title: Jung
programme.desc: Veer is an honest police officer who desperately needs to save his son's life. However, after losing all hope, he finds out that a criminal in jail is his only saviour.

programme.title: LIE
programme.desc: Sathyam and Chaitra meet unexpectedly and decide to only lie to each other. Soon, after they fall in love, Sathyam encounters Padmanabham, a criminal on the run from the Indian police.

programme.title: Judwaa
programme.desc: Twin brothers Raja and Prem Malhotra get separated at birth but are reunited by fate to defeat Ratanlal, a local gangster, who wants to destroy the Malhotra family.

programme.title: Sangdil Sanam

programme.title: Copy Cat
programme.desc: A rookie and veteran detective work together on the case of a murdered young journalist. They quickly arrest a prime suspect who seems all but surely the killer. Yet, the ease of everything unsettles them – something isn’t right but what exactly?

programme.title: Cryptid Hunter
programme.desc: A mockumentary about a passionate monster enthusiast’s search for elusive cryptids like ‘Bigfoot‘ or ‘Nessie‘. However, no matter how hard he tries to find them, he never seems to be able to spot any, even if they were right in front of his very eyes.

programme.title: Lily!
programme.desc: Grandmother Nia has Alzheimer's disease. She can't remember and process her environment well. Grandmother Nia can’t even remember her own family. Her granddaughter Lily made a origami crane hoping that her grandmother could recover from her illness.

programme.title: A Summer in Greece
programme.desc: On her first trip as driver, Rieke loses her company’s new coach. Faced with the risk of getting fired, she travels across Greece in search of it. Along the way, she meets the suave Yannis, who’s about to help her in more ways than she’s ever imagined.

programme.title: My Father's Bike

programme.title: Color Of The Ocean

programme.title: The Startup
programme.desc: A true story of Matteo Achilli, an 18 year-old boy, who designs an innovative job-searching app. Though response is initially lacklustre, he perseveres. Soon enough, his app brings him immense popularity and wealth. But success comes with a hefty price.

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: The Furlough
programme.desc: Four inmates with vastly different convictions are granted a 48 hours furlough. Some seek to redeem failed relationships while others search for vengeance. But above it all, each of them seeks to reclaim their dignity and lust for life once again.

programme.title: Jeune Juliette

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Beach Chair Murder
programme.desc: The body of Marion Caspary is found in a beach chair by the sea. Near the scene of the crime, Commissioner Sievers comes across Piet Pinter, an elderly confused gentleman. What connection does he have to the murder?

programme.desc: Historian Nina returns to her alma mater Oxford to deliver a series of summer lectures. Soon, she finds herself caught in the crossfire of the affections of two men: one, her former advisor and old love interest and the other, a down-to-earth plumber.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: The Grump
programme.desc: After a bad fall, a grumpy old farmer is forced to move to the city to live with his meek son and domineering daughter-in-law. He ends up squabbling with her and the house becomes a chaotic hellhole. Yet, with time, the family becomes closer than ever.

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Mortal Club
programme.desc: In this black comedy, Inspector Coliandro discovers a series of gladiator-esque fights that involve fighters who are systematically drugged and manipulated. His sidekick for this case is Veena, a beautiful fighter who was herself once part of the system.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.desc: Jen Hansen’s death seems by all accounts to be the tragic result of a deadly robbery. However, Sievers suspects that there is foul play afoot as his investigation unearths the skeletons in the pilot’s closet involving his brother and lover.

programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Sleepless Nights

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Less Than 2 Ounces
programme.desc: After learning how to manipulate weighing scales from his father, the six year old son of a vegetable seller attempts to trick a woman. However, his actions backfire on him when she catches on to the trick.

programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Special Match
programme.desc: In an attempt to help his good friend, Gamberini, with his gambling addiction, Inspector Coliandro infiltrates a clandestine gambling group. However, in doing so, he misses out on another of his case assignments and ends up endangering both their lives.

programme.desc: Leonard regrets his newfound authority at work when he's responsible to distributing grant money; And Bernadette turns the playhouse into her hideaway.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 08
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to bond with Amy's parents. Meanwhile, Raj and Anu attempt to get physical.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 10
programme.desc: A covered car lures our buyers to bid big, but the reveal could be more than the winner bargained for. Then, as the temperature climbs to the hottest day of the year, Jesse loses out to Dan on a locker full of expensive tools. But just when it lookslike Jesse is out of the race, he comes back with his biggest score yet. And later, tempers swelter as the final auction of the day pits all of our buyers in a bidding war so intense, one of them cracks under the pressure.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 16
programme.desc: Following an emotional reunion with her mother, Veronica is hired to track down Neptune High's beloved mascot, Polly the Parrot, which was apparently kidnapped by a rival school on the eve of a big basketball game. Meanwhile, with her suspicions about the Kane family rekindled, Veronica attempts to gain access to her father's original interrogation tapes. programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 10
programme.desc: A covered car lures our buyers to bid big, but the reveal could be more than the winner bargained for. Then, as the temperature climbs to the hottest day of the year, Jesse loses out to Dan on a locker full of expensive tools. But just when it lookslike Jesse is out of the race, he comes back with his biggest score yet. And later, tempers swelter as the final auction of the day pits all of our buyers in a bidding war so intense, one of them cracks under the pressure.

programme.desc: The competition is off with a bang as a locker full of fishing gear sparks fast and furious bidding war that leaves the winner with a surprise catch. Then, Lori butts heads with another bidder, but is it all just a mind-game to try and steal a goldenunit? And later, Papa Bear scoops up a locker for a hefty price, but when he starts digging he quickly discovers his prize possession isn't exactly street legal.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 12
programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to win a locker packed with recreational equipment and what looks like a hidden tractor. But when the dust settles and the cover's pulled back, one lucky hunter gets the surprise of a lifetime.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 17
programme.desc: As she continues investigating Lilly Kane's murder, Veronica pursues a risky lead that could discredit Abel Koontz's (not appearing in this episode) confession when she discovers that the convicted killer has a daughter, Amelia DeLongpre (ERIN CHAMBERS), who is about to receive a huge payoff from Jake Kane (recurring guest star KYLE SECOR). Logan stumbles onto Veronica's detailed computer files of everyone connected to Lilly's death. At school, Veronica is hired by a senior student, Sabrina(MEGAN HENNING), to find the party responsible for tormenting her in an attempt to sabotage Sabrina's chances at becoming valedictorian. Sabrina is not well liked by most of her peers, and the long list of suspects includes her ex-boyfriend and herclosest competitor. Meanwhile, unsavory, rival private investigator Vinnie Vanlowe (KEN MARINO) makes Keith a business offer.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 13
programme.desc: After being hired by hip-hop heavyweight Percy "Bone" Hamilton (ANTHONY ANDERSON - "Kangaroo Jack," "Barbershop") to find his kidnapped daughter, Veronica and Keith look to the music mogul's long list of enemies and family members and the girl's Neptune High social circle for clues to her whereabouts. Meanwhile, following his mother's apparent suicide, Logan cynically endures the effusive displays of grief by his father, Aaron (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN), as they prepare for the memorial ceremony.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 14
programme.desc: After one of Neptune High's haughtier students brings a sexual harassment suit against a favorite teacher, Veronica is pitted against her father when the girl's parents hire Keith to help in their case. Meanwhile, with the tabloids claiming his momis still alive, Logan turns to Veronica to help him track down the truth. Later, Veronica discovers more unsettling information about Duncan's hidden medical condition.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 15
programme.desc: To her surprise, Veronica works as a "love detective" when she's asked to track down her friend Meg's (recurring guest star ALONA TAL) secret admirer and a Russian bride's estranged fiancé. Meanwhile, after discovering that a credit card belongingto Lynn Echolls, who apparently committed suicide recently, is being used, Veronica and Logan go to a Los Angeles hotel in hopes of finding either her or a clue. Recurring guest star ALYSON HANNIGAN ("Buffy The Vampire Slayer") appears as Logan's half sister Trina Echolls.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 8
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori return to Boston and square off against his former protege Wade. The bad blood may just erupt into a full-out brawl on the auction floor. Then, a former military hero goes all in on a locker that turns out to be hiding the ultimate score. And later, the contents of a unit spark an outrage among the buyers, but Brandon only sees dollar signs. Will he walk away or will this controversial cache crush his morals?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 9
programme.desc: The score of a lifetime is hidden in the back of what already appears to be a great locker, but when the bidding heats up, will our auction heroes have the cash to stay in this game? But first, Brandon and Lori face a shocking discovery when the contents of what look like an old retail store reveal their true identity. And later, some rare antiques fetch a fair price but further exploration of a hidden whale tusk could mean a windfall for one lucky storage hunter.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 1
programme.desc: Old rivals unite when Brandon and Jesse are faced with the unthinkable: join forces or stand alone to gamble on a once-in-a-lifetime locker. Then, a vintage motorcycle and rare car parts create big cash for one of our slickest auction heroes. And later, the Taylor Brothers are in for the fight of their lives when they leave the Deep South for the promise of California gold. It's an old-world battle that could lead to a new world order.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 2
programme.desc: The competition heats up as Brandon and Lori find themselves in an all out bidding war with the tough-talking Taylor brothers. Amidst the chaos, Jesse goes all-in for a locker that could be hiding an expert marksman's rare weapons. And later, Sean unveils a bin whose stench is so rancid it sends the buyers running. But when one of our competitors takes a gamble, the entire group is blown away by the score.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 3
programme.desc: Our buyers go to war to win a locker packed with valuable vintage surf gear. Then, Brandon and Lori get stuck with a busted bin, but when they find a glass case filled with an unidentifiable goo, they're left wondering if this unit smells like moneyor just plain stinks. And later, the day's final auction unleashes a bidding war so medieval, someone will have to be carted away.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 13
programme.desc: A container riddled with bullets, a burned-out box, and a freak accident on the lot put everyone on edge, until an out-of-this-world discovery leads to the biggest win yet.

programme.title: The Marksman
programme.desc: When an ex-marine witnesses a young migrant fleeing from drug cartel assassins, the two hit the road together with the group of killers in pursuit and slowly forge an unlikely friendship.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 01
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q take their talents to Miami for the season premiere, pulling all new pranks on the beach. The guys zip around in scooters controlled by the other Jokers, and the loser will come face-to-face with an alligator.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 01
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy's honeymoon runs aground in New York in the twelfth season premiere. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny discover they're uncomfortably similar to Amy's parents.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 02
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy are baffled by the gift Penny and Leonard got them for their wedding; and Raj decides he wants his father to find him an arranged marriage.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 03
programme.desc: The Wolowitzes' life gets complicated when Stuart brings his new girlfriend home; Meanwhile Penny and Leonard talk about starting a family.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 04
programme.desc: When Sheldon won't tell anyone why he's never mentioned Tam (ROBERT WU), his childhood best friend, Leonard takes matters into his own hands. JERRY O'CONNELL guest stars.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 05
programme.desc: Sheldon sabotages Amy's career and gets a ghostly visit from an old friend; Meanwhile Raj refused Howard's offer to co-host a planetarium show.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 4
programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to score a locker packed with rare movie memorabilia. Then, Papa Bear and T-Money each scoop up low-grade bins, but when they each start to sift through their individual messes, one of them finds a childhood dream-come-true. Andlater, the day's final auction sparks an intense bidding war, but when one of our buyers shoots the moon on his bid, it leaves everyone else wondering exactly where all of this cash is coming from.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 5
programme.desc: Our buyers lock horns to win a unit packed with valuable construction equipment. Then, Brandon and Lori spot something that no one else does, but they'll have to play it cool if they want to walk away with this golden score. And later, the day's final locker smells of gas and cash, but leads to a showdown that gets one of our buyers banned from the auction.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 6
programme.desc: Minds are blown when two of our buyers team up for a major score. It's an unlikely pair that, together, could make a pile of cash. Plus, Jesse takes a big gamble on some African art and sweats it out hard when the authenticity is questioned. And later, the day's final auction reveals contents so shocking our buyers may be shut out of this game completely.

programme.title: Animals Unleashed S1 41
programme.desc: Hungry chickens hang out, a polar bear plays Frisbee, and kangaroos take over a trailer park. And in our Top 5, monkeys play in an Indian temple.

programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q take their talents to Miami for the season premiere, pulling all new pranks on the beach. The guys zip around in scooters controlled by the other Jokers, and the loser will come face-to-face with an alligator.

programme.desc: <What is> provides viewers with intimate coverage of the latest and hottest issues making headlines in Korea through the eyes of the producers in charge and a wide variety of different outside perspectives. <What is> poses important, thought-provoking questions about various subjects, people, and phenomena, providing viewers with accurate information and issues to contemplate over through in-depth reporting and expert analysis from the leading minds in their respective fields.

programme.title: Rewind It: I'm Live Ep136
programme.desc: I'm Live is a live concert program featuring Korea's top musicians. Musicians and fans interact with one another in close proximity, becoming one in the name of music.

programme.title: Travel Track: Travel Ep9
programme.desc: Travel Track, a series of honest-to-goodness, self-guided trips in Korea’s hidden travel destinations! Four individuals with fantastic chemistry form a team to experience and introduce each destination’s local experiences, cuisine, and attractions!

programme.title: Travel Track: Busking Ep9
programme.desc: Travel Track, a series of honest-to-goodness, self-guided trips in Korea’s hidden travel destinations! Four individuals with fantastic chemistry form a team to experience and introduce each destination’s local experiences, cuisine, and attractions!

programme.title: Catchy Korea Ep127
programme.desc: The center of the Korean Wave, where you can learn Korea’s sophisticated culture. CATCHY KOREA, a comprehensive cultural content in “Omnibus format”. The whole world keeps its eyes on what happens in Korea! We bring you a fresh take on Korea’s up-and-coming events, fascinating culinary, culture, and festival scenes. Now it’s the era where culture and art are also enjoyed by streaming! Time for little chit-chats with rising stars in culture and art fields! Let’s take a close peep in their personal and honest stories.

programme.title: Arirang Special Ep135
programme.desc: Arirang Special features a variety of unique and special programs produced by Arirang TV. These exciting programs will open your eyes to a new part of the world.

programme.title: Newsmakers Ep10
programme.desc: <Newsmakers> is a new show where Arirang TV newbie reporters communicate with viewers on Youtube in order to know what they want for the news. You can come and join the show in real time on Youtube! Please tell us what you want us to cover!

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - The Young Ones Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 - Creatures Great and Small Ep5
programme.desc: See Amanda and Sophie push boundaries to get a vervet monkey with a broken leg back into the wild, the team is challenged when collaring a four-ton elephant. Alma receives an orphaned, cat-like genet and an antisocial baboon rejoins a troop.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 - Catch Me if You Can Ep6
programme.desc: Join the rescue as Amanda and Mandy try every trick in the book to help a snared hyena, a lion threatens a village, and the team's plan to release a troop of 13 monkeys is thwarted by last minute surgery and some crafty escape artists.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Head & Neck Ep1

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Reef Wrecks of Bonaire Ep1
programme.desc: Bonaire’s fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Flood Ep2
programme.desc: Waters flood Southern Florida's mangroves and marshes. Many of the 600 animal species that live in the Everglades disperse during this time, expanding their hunting and breeding grounds.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 - Creatures Great and Small Ep5
programme.desc: See Amanda and Sophie push boundaries to get a vervet monkey with a broken leg back into the wild, the team is challenged when collaring a four-ton elephant. Alma receives an orphaned, cat-like genet and an antisocial baboon rejoins a troop.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 - Catch Me if You Can Ep6
programme.desc: Join the rescue as Amanda and Mandy try every trick in the book to help a snared hyena, a lion threatens a village, and the team's plan to release a troop of 13 monkeys is thwarted by last minute surgery and some crafty escape artists.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Interior Ep3
programme.desc: Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Eyes Ep4
programme.desc: Why do zebras have stripes? How do penguins see underwater? And why are a tree frog’s eyes red? In this exploration of sight, discover how some animals have evolved to see extremely well while others have evolved to be nearly invisible.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail Ep2
programme.desc: The Florida Keys is the first line of defence for the southern US. With a rich naval history and a coastal lifestyle, it’s easy to believe locals who claim these waters are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboons of Bambelela Ep4
programme.desc: With power in numbers, adaptability and intelligent leadership, the Bambelela baboon troop is an excellent example of why baboons thrive throughout Africa. Their highly refined social behavior and organization mirror much of human society and show just how alike we are to our primate cousins.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Beast Buddies Ep4
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - November-December - Full Circle Ep6
programme.desc: Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Social Animals Ep5
programme.desc: Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Ancient Lineages Ep6
programme.desc: Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Isimangoliso Ep3
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as “the Miracle”, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Rhythm of the Bay Ep1
programme.desc: The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North America’s largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere. The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Yukon Wild Ep2
programme.desc: The Yukon is a true wilderness, one of the last on Earth. The vast land got its name from its longest river, which the Gwich’in, one of the indigenous people of the region, call "Yu-kun- ah", or, the "great river". The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3,000 km Northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Waiting for Winter Ep3
programme.desc: It’s November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. But the ice - which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now - is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record. In late November, the temperature is 10 degrees warmer than its average. Climate change is wreaking havoc across the North. At just below zero degrees Celsius, the sea cannot freeze.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Creature Comforts Ep5
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: MTV Unplugged: Nirvana
programme.desc: Nirvana - On the 18th November 1993, Nirvana recorded their now legendary MTV Unplugged performance. Relive the special gig now, including seminal classics like 'Come As You Are' & 'All Apologies'.

programme.title: MTV Unplugged: Liam Gallagher
programme.desc: Liam Gallagher - Recorded live at the Hull City Hall, legendary frontman Liam Gallagher performs a one-off acoustic set of songs from his solo albums along with some Oasis classics, exclusively for MTV Unplugged.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2016
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2016 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep28
programme.desc: Speed - Ty can't stop rolling after Skrap-It steals his master cylinder, so the Trux must quickly figure out a fix before he falls off the edge of a cliff

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep14
programme.desc: Big In Japan - Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep28
programme.desc: Where The Koobish Roam / Best Friendiversary - On a Koobish cattle drive together, Tip and Krunkle's differences result in Oh and the herd getting lost in a stampede; Tip and Oh can't agree on how to celebrate their Friendiversary

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep14
programme.desc: Mihos - Cleo encounters an adorable alien creature and brings him home, along with his eggs. Wait, if he’s a “him,” how does he have eggs? Aliens are weird.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Deja Flu / Crackridge Live - It's Archibald to the rescue when Loy, Sage and Finly come down with a bad case of the Déjà Flu. Archibald and Cousin Ashley take over the airwaves.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dinmaker Diva - A bungled attempt at a stunt leads to Dennis inadvertently becoming an internet star and Beanotown celebrity! But fame is fleeting and Dennis is soon replaced by Walter’s cat who can play the piano. Dennis has to stage the best stunt yet to gain back his fame, putting Gnasher in peril!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Raiders Of The Lost Sweetie - Mrs Creecher confiscates Dennis’ rare sour sweetie - The Tongue Destroyer! Dennis is desperate to get the sweet back and takes his friends on an adventure to the school’s Confiscatorium, hidden in the depths of Bash Street School!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep54
programme.desc: Not A Drill - With the prospect of a steady stream of monsters pouring from the portal to the Netherworld, Puss decides to put a Master Monster Plan into effect

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep2
programme.desc: Poll Position - King Julien learns that 99% of the lemurs love him, so he makes it his mission to find and convert his one "hater."

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep73
programme.desc: There Will Be Mud - Big Oil is bringing big improvements to the school. But new track stables, an upgraded veterinary lab and dorm rooms come at a cost — and spark disaster.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Don'T Worry Be Peppy / Two'S A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesn’t feel useful now that’s he’s no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branch’s bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Dreadful Debacle Of Dj Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee’s Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays With Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep54
programme.desc: Sandbusted - When Hiccup is summoned to the Northern Markets to look into a curse that causes people to disappear, he is sucked down into a cavern of the fearsome Sandbuster

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep4
programme.desc: This Means Warts - When snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, The Croods launch into the first-ever prank war.

programme.title: 3 Below: Tales Of Arcadia Ep18
programme.desc: Ill Gotten Gains - Two royal teenage aliens and their bodyguard flee a surprise takeover of their home planet by an evil dictator and crash land in Arcadia. Now on the run from intergalactic bounty hunters, they struggle to blend in and adapt to the bizarre world of high school all the while attempting to repair their ship so they can return and defend their home planet.

programme.desc: Not A Drill - With the prospect of a steady stream of monsters pouring from the portal to the Netherworld, Puss decides to put a Master Monster Plan into effect
