programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Don'T Worry Be Peppy / Two'S A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesn’t feel useful now that’s he’s no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branch’s bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Wacky Weekday / Hike Caramba! - The Harvey Girls are splitting up for the day, but they've accidentally swapped suitcases -- and personalities! Dot trains to become a Trout Master.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Rupert And The Photo Finish - RUPERT lends his TRIPOD to the TWINS to keep their camera steady. The TWINS surprise RAGGETY, who accidentally aims a spell at the CAMERA, which comes alive. Now they're playing camera tag! Except if you get flashed you end up stuck in a photo! After RAGGETY, PING PONG, MING, EDWARD and BILL are all trapped, RUPERT realises that if they all get zapped they won't be able to play again – or even get out of the photos. But RUPERT has a plan. The TWINS act as bait so he can outsmart the CAMERA with its own reflection. The CAMERA takes a photo of itself, which releases everyone, and RAGGETY gets everything back to normal with a final spell.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Rupert Lights The Way - When the Rocky Bay lighthouse stops working Rupert and friends try to help. But what can create enough light to warn the ships away from the rocks? When he sees Ming snapping at a firefly, Rupert gets an idea....

programme.title: My Life Me Ep43
programme.desc: Love Is In The Air - Spring has sprung and love is in the air at Cosmos High. When the other pods pressure Sandra and Raffi to couple-up, lovelorn Birch and Liam decide to take matters into their own hands ensuring that the reluctant pair don't end up together.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep44
programme.desc: Cyranette - A cute guy into comics mistakes Birch's artwork as Sandra's comic. When the ruse is revealed, he falls for Birch. Sandra's ire rises, but both girls ultimately find out they've got a High School Lothario on their hands and reveal him to the sisterhood of Cosmos High.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep95
programme.desc: Mystery In Flowertot Garden - Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep96
programme.desc: Stingo Cleans Up - Diggly has had enough of the heap of unwanted items next to his compost heap. Stingo decides to "resell" them to the other tots and unwittingly helps everybody out!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Goodbye, Rubi Doomsday - Rubi gets a place in a Summer School for Super Smart Kids, which turns out to be a trick to exploit her technical brilliance and get her unwittingly working for WilburCorp, giving Walter the power to control clouds.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Pi In The Sky - The Gang spot what appears to be a meteor, through Screwtop’s mega-powerful telescope. It turns out to be an early space-invention of the Professor’s, hurtling back towards Earth, on collision course with Beanotown! Can Dennis and the gang save the day or will Beanotown be destroyed forever!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep74
programme.desc: Knights Of Light, Part 1 - With Allura as their guide, the Paladins embark on a dangerous journey into Honerva’s mindspace to uncover her final plan.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep24
programme.desc: Ruff Guyz/George Crum - When Peabody gets carried away trying to create the perfect band using historical friends, Sherman must stop him from becoming a music monster

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep22
programme.desc: Wind - A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Boo To You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep3
programme.desc: Imperfect Harmony - The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Who'S A Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Horrible Hostilities Of The Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep74
programme.desc: Race To The Finish Part 1 - The girls get summer jobs to help Lucky repair the sprawling house she inherited from her grandfather near the Rosemead Valley Racetrack.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep3
programme.desc: Royal Review / Funishment - Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep5
programme.desc: New Sponsor/ Cleopatra - Sherman goes gaga when his favorite snack in the world, Guapo Taco Pudding, sponsors the show; beautiful Cleopatra turns out to be a belching queen.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep22
programme.desc: House Of The Future / Dr. Buttersocks - Loy upgrades the house with a few seemingly helpful robotic enhancements. Archibald becomes a sock-puppet wrestling superstar.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Songwing Ep1
programme.desc: Secrets Of The Songwing - The Rescue Riders race to save Aggro after she falls under a spell from a unique dragon with a musical call that traps anyone who hears it - and makes them sing.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep5
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sleepy Toys - Everyone in Brickabuild keeps falling asleep and no one can get any building work finished. It's all because the lights keep coming on all night! Noddy decides to investigate who is turning the lights on. Bravely overcoming his own fear of the dark, he follows the clues to discover that the lights are being secretly turned on by a scared Carlton, who doesn't like the dark. Kind Noddy tells him that he's not the only one scared of the dark and after Carlton is given a cuddle device to cuddle, everyone can get a good night's sleep! Sleep tight, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Secret Deliveries - Someone is giving presents to everyone in Toyland and all the toys want to say thank you but no one knows the identity of the secret gift giver! It's up to Noddy to investigate and find out who is it that's leaving presents for all the friends. By following clues and using his investigation skills, Noddy follows the trail to Animal Acres and discovers that Pat Pat and the Pockets are the secret gift-givers. Kind Noddy has a great idea and when Pat Pat makes her final delivery she finds a big pile of presents waiting for her from all her grateful friends. Thank you Pat Pat! And thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi'S Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep29
programme.desc: Flynt - Ty gets jealous when a Hydrodon named Flynt becomes everyone's new hero, but when a blazing fire heads towards the ravine, Ty must ask Flynt for help

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep15
programme.desc: A New York Minute - Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep29
programme.desc: Citizen Brain / Lair Liar Pods On Fire - The Big Brain Boov recruit Oh to join them; Oh is introduced to the concept of "harmless lying," and lies so much that he is unable to distinguish between fact and fiction

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep15
programme.desc: Cyrano - Brian downloads some sketchy software that promises to make him cool. It works out great and everyone’s happy! (JK, it’s a huge disaster.)

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck'S Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep22
programme.desc: House Of The Future / Dr. Buttersocks - Loy upgrades the house with a few seemingly helpful robotic enhancements. Archibald becomes a sock-puppet wrestling superstar.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Boo To You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Escape From Azka-Bash - Dennis must escape detention and Bash Street School to make the Beanotown Brawny Bean Race before Walter wins it! With the help of a note placed in his desk, he must sneak past Mrs Creecher and make a run for it – unless the mysterious note giver stops him first!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Griller Thriller - Dennis’ ultimate hero, Grizzly Griller, plans on trekking to the source of the River Beano, broadcasting the treacherous path on live TV. Dennis introduces him to his pet hamster, Galahad – only to discover they are his biggest fear! Grizzly is so torn up that Dennis must disguise himself as his hero and go in his place!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep55
programme.desc: Caballo Sin Cabeza - When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep3
programme.desc: Enter The Fanaloka - The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.

programme.desc: Race To The Finish Part 1 - The girls get summer jobs to help Lucky repair the sprawling house she inherited from her grandfather near the Rosemead Valley Racetrack.

programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that it’s time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.desc: Richie Rich And The Tapir Of Doom / Dollar Dollar Saves Y'All - Tiny and Lucretia sign on as sidekicks in Richie's search for a legendary treasure. Dollar's desperate to prove he's the Best Good Boy.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Rupert And The Sleepy Flowers - RUPERT wants to play with RAGGETY. But Raggety has to work - MOTHER NATURE needs him to plant seedlings. Rupert decides to make Raggety's life easier, and discovers Ping Pong has some magic seeds for flowers that grow really easily, no watering or pruning required. Rupert and Raggety scatter these seeds across Nutwood, head off to have fun. But the flowers turn out to be Snoozeflowers: their perfume sends everyone to sleep. Rupert's plan for Raggety doing less work has backfired – Nutwood is going to become a place where nothing's done at all, because everyone's sleeping. Luckily, it's revealed that rain will wash the snooze away, and Rupert takes Raggety up to the top of the lighthouse so he can make rainstorms, rescue Nutwood from sleepiness. They get down to gardening together!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magical Puppets - Rupert and his friends have fun making puppet versions of themselves. They are amazed when the puppets appear to come alive and run away, forcing the friends to pursue them all over Nutwood.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep45
programme.desc: Liam And The Kid'S Big Day Out - When Liam announces he's babysitting Bubba Johnson, Sandra bets he won't last the day. Liam accepts the bet, adding that if he wins, she has to go to the movies with him. Will Liam manage to get the upper hand with the 7-year-old delinquent or will he become another Cosmos High teen destroyed by Bubba?

programme.title: My Life Me Ep46
programme.desc: Cut Out The Sarcasm - Sandra takes up the challenge to quit being sarcastic for an entire week. But the bet doesn't get really interesting until each of the podmates takes up a challenge pertaining to his or her own character faults. Soon the foursome is working to undermine each others' efforts in order to win the bet.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep97
programme.desc: My Fair Bumble - Bumble has been asked to Aunt Tulip's for tea but he is worried that his manners are not up to scratch. He asks the other tots to help him out.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep98
programme.desc: Pineapple Palace Panic - Fifi is supposed to be babysitting Grubby, but she's forgotten! Stingo and Slugsy step in to cover for her, with disastrous results!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Bmxcess - JJ’s so keen to get Dennis the new bike she thinks he’s desperate to have, that she gets caught up in a “you scratch my back” predicament with Walter, surreptitiously feeding him security information that could lead to a jelly-blasting rampage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.desc: Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards - Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day?

programme.desc: The Great Pizza Race - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet / The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.desc: Genie in a Bubble! - When Nonny, Gil and Zooli conjure a genie, she agrees to grant whoever brings her the most precious gift a wish. They think it might be a precious gem, but turns out it's friendship!

programme.desc: Teensy the Tardigrade - Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep511
programme.desc: Snow Squad to the Rescue! - When someone's stealing sleeping bags from campers, Gil is convinced a yeti is to blame! Will the Snow Squad catch the culprit?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Detectives - Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Super Christopher - Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep301
programme.desc: Our New Neighbor! - Josh and Blue have some BIG news--a new neighbor just moved in next door... it's Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Bouncy Tires - When Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally puts on a set of “Super Bouncy Tires,” he bounces out of control! Now Blaze and AJ have to experiment to find a substance adhesive enough to stop their bouncing buddy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep713
programme.desc: Pups Save A Lost Gold Miner / Pups Save Uncle Otis From His Cabin - Uncle Otis takes a trip to a lost gold mine. After wandering off course, Ryder and the Pups must save him from the booby-trapped mine. // Uncle Otis's installs a Smart Home 3000, in his cabin, that ends up trapping Uncle Otis and Mr. Wingnut inside!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Steel Antlers / Berry Bad - Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Magnet Maelstrom - When Sir Steel collects metal in the city for Muffin's pooch pamper parlor using a giant magnet, Deer Squad has to think out of the box to stop him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Colors Everywhere with Blue - Josh and Blue are painting a portrait of their friends, but it's not quite finished. We play Blue's Clues to figure out who else Blue wants to add to her painting. While looking for clues we skidoo to help out our color friends!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Pajama Party with Blue - It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Ice Cream Monster Machine - Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Santiago's Greatest Treasure / The Golden Banana Treasure - When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. // Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: William vs. Wild - After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep820
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Break the Ice / Rescue Knight: Pups Save Excalibark - Claw finds a way to make Sparks' breath icy and sets out to freeze all of Barkingburg. // When Chase accidentally pulls the legendary Golden Bone of Excalibark from its stone and becomes the Royal Knight, the Duke and Claw plot to ruin the day.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIngertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooter - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Blue's Big Neighborhood Adventure - Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep109
programme.desc: Together - Dipsy and Laa-Laa drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. They meet Tinky Winky and Po and the Teletubbies go on the Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Lion - Dee encourages a friend to say lion and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep48
programme.desc: Seeing Stars - The Team help two hipster Po to see the stars.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: It's time to grow a flower - JoJo tries to grow a daffodil but is disheartened to learn that it will take a long time to bloom. Cynthia and Gran Gran show JoJo how to take care of it and the best way to measure its growth.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep74
programme.desc: Purple Zappa - Monty gets a new toy robot and wonders whether it is better to keep it shiny and clean in the box or to have fun playing with it.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep73
programme.desc: Monty Rides Again - Monty is nervous about trying skateboarding and begins wondering why some people just seem to have courage and others don't.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: The Adventure - Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals, helping them to learn all about life in far away places, earning their Pen Pal badges and making some new friends in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: The Gobi Desert, Mongolia - Glitch's giant drill causes a dino-disaster for the team's fossil hunt in the Gobi Desert.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: Maasai Mara National Park, Kenya - The team roars into action as Glitch tries to take a selfie with a lion in the Maasai Mara.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: Backpackers - Mum and Dad are going on an adventure wearing the kids as their cheeky backpacks! Seeing the sights and buying street food, backpacking is a blast - until they lose their passports.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep35
programme.desc: Zoo - Bluey's backyard zoo is home to wonderful animals, especially the big blue Daddy gorilla. But when he grabs visitor Bingo and escapes, Zookeeper Bluey must recapture the wild beast.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Brachiosaurus and Monkey Puzzle - Andy Day travels 150 million years into the past to the time of the plant-eating brachiosaurus, and also tries to find a branch of a monkey puzzle tree.

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Rail Machines - Catie tests out three amazing machines that run on rails: a steam train, an amazing Maglev train and a tram.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: Swashbuckle Pirate Party - Gem is joined by some CBeebies friends for a special Pirate Party as Tanay, Freya, Jonas and Josiah are the team of Swashbucklers trying to win back Gem's jewels!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: The Get Indoors Badge - A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up all the creatures they can find outside and pile into the clubhouse for an impromptu party.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: The Camouflage Badge - The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about how to blend into their surroundings, earning their Camouflage Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: The Day Off Badge - It's Duggee's Day Off but it's not long before the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures on their own days off... earning their Day Off badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: Cappadocia, Turkey - A game of hide and seek threatens to topple the fairy chimneys of Cappadocia in Turkey.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep42
programme.desc: Hong Kong, China - The Go Jetters spring into action when Glitch's mini-master toys invade Hong Kong Harbour.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep8
programme.desc: Thomas Toots the Crows - Thomas promises to act as a scarecrow for Farmer McColl, but does not do a very good job.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: Sticker Swap - Sarah is keen to complete her sticker album, so sets off to see if her friends can help with her collection.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: Dewy Morning - Sarah and Duck are so keen to visit the art shop, they get there too early and have to find things to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Moon Path - On a cloudless night, Nelly and Nora help Mrs. Bonner search for her cat Morris.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep19
programme.desc: Please May I Have Some of Yours? - On a trip to the zoo, Lola can't seem to save anything for later. Charlie helps out, as ever, and is later rewarded by his grateful little sister.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The Thing That Wanted To Be Alone - Dinopaw Mabel tells the firends how great it is to be alone, so they all head off in separate directions - but they soon get lonely.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The Thing That We'd Never Seen Before - Gwen, Bob and Tony meet the world's longest dinopaw, who tells them that they will see something very exciting.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep34
programme.desc: The Dump - On a trip to the Dump, Dad claims he's the best at everything. But Bluey discovers that Dad's throwing out her old drawing and questions if he really is the best Dad in the world.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: The Duck Badge - The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum, so Duggee and the Squirrels need to do some detective work to reunite them with their real mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath and teach him a special song to help him learn how to brush his teeth.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep52
programme.desc: The Glasses Badge - When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help make his dreams come true?

programme.desc: Lake Retba, Senegal - The team gets all shook up when Glitch sucks up the pink water of Senegal's Milkshake Lake.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep5
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep19
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep1
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep504ChrisBarnettFeatherweightsDricusduPlessisKhaosWilliams
programme.desc: Heavyweight Chris Barnett explains how Taekwondo and dancing helped shape his unique style inside the Octagon. UFC featherweight Cub Swanson gives us a look into the history of the 126 pound division. South African prospect Dricus du Plessis details his country’s rich sporting history, and what it means to represent them on MMA’s biggest stage. And welterweight “Khaos” Williams brings us back to his UFC Debut at UFC 247
